mapper.sql: id, pid, serialNo, billNo, projectCode, projectName, medicalPrice, ruleName, deductPrice, deductReason, repaymentReason, doctorName, deptCode, deptName, costDate, costDateStr, hospitalizedNo, treatmentMode, settlementDate, settlementDateStr, personalNo, insuredName, cardNumber, areaName,insuredType,dataType,orderNumber, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT yb_reconsider_reset_data.* FROM yb_reconsider_reset_data INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_reset on yb_reconsider_reset.id = yb_reconsider_reset_data.pid AND yb_reconsider_reset.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 where yb_reconsider_reset_data.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 AND yb_reconsider_reset.applyDateStr = #{ applyDateStr} and yb_reconsider_reset_data.dataType =#{ dataType}
